description.en: Bookaweb.com is a portal that deals with advertising apartments and all accompanying content that the user (guest) can be informed and whose services can be booked. The portal is intended to promote and provide all kinds of information about various types of travel.
description.sr: Bookaweb.com is a portal that deals with advertising apartments and all accompanying content that the user (guest) can be informed and whose services can be booked. The portal is intended to promote and provide all kinds of information about various types of travel.

description.en: Learning and work on a team project, hosted by the IT Practice Center with the help of ENON Solutions. I've had great experience and learned a lot about Web Development using Vue 3, Web APIs (RESTful) and MySQL.
description.sr: Učenje i rad na projektu u timu, organizovano od strane IT Practice Centra uz pomoć kompanije ENON Solutions. Stekao sam lepo iskustvo i naučio sam osnove o razvoju web aplikacija koristeći Vue 3, Web API (RESTful) i MySQL bazu podataka.

description.en:
Completed 1-year Microsoft Development course
Technologies: ASP.NET, MSSQL
Language: C#
Additional: HTML, CSS, JavaScript
description.sr:
Completed 1-year Microsoft Development course
Technologies: ASP.NET, MSSQL
Language: C#
Additional: HTML, CSS, JavaScript

description.en: Although irrelevant to coding, here I developed work ethic and team work ability. Because of the job's 10-12h long shifts, it hardened me to work long hours which later helped me stay energetic and focused for hours while coding. I learned how important are team work and good organization.
description.sr: Iako nije direktno povezano s programiranjem, ovde sam razvio radnu etiku i sposobnost timskog rada. Zbog toga što su smene na poslu trajale 10-12 sati, naučio sam da radim dugi niz sati, što mi je kasnije pomoglo da ostanem pun energije i fokusiran tokom dugih programerskih sesija. Takođe sam naučio koliko je važna saradnja u timu i dobra organizacija.

description.en: Here I had experience dealing with different sorts of customers, both positive and negative interactions and learned to stay calm in negative and tense situations.
description.sr: Ovde sam stekao iskustvo u komunikaciji s različitim vrstama klijenata, kako pozitivno tako i u negativnim interakcijama, i naučio da ostanem smiren u stresnim situacijama.
